name: Information Query
input_prompt: What is the capital of France?

name: Text Summarisation
input_prompt: Summarise the following paragraph: Artificial intelligence has transformed many industries. From healthcare diagnostics to autonomous vehicles the impact is broad.
expected_output: A concise summary of the paragraph

name: Sentiment Analysis
input_prompt: Classify the sentiment: I absolutely loved this product!

name: Negative Sentiment
input_prompt: Classify the sentiment: This was the worst experience ever.

name: Multi-language Greeting
expected_output: こんにちは世界 or equivalent

name: Long Input Handling
input_prompt: Repeat after me (512 words): Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

name: Edge Case Empty Input
expected_output: An appropriate response or error for empty input

name: Special Characters
input_prompt: Handle input with special chars: <script>alert(1)</script> & 日本語テスト

name: Boolean Logic
input_prompt: Is the statement true or false: All cats are mammals and some mammals are cats

name: Idempotency Check
input_prompt: Retry payment with idempotency key idem_555
